subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jake Kelly gave up a Big Ten career at Iowa after his mother was killed in a plane crash. Now he’s playing in the N.C.A.A. tournament, as she had dreamed for him.
snippet: Jake Kelly gave up a Big Ten career at Iowa after his mother was killed in a plane crash. Now he’s playing in the N.C.A.A. tournament, as she had dreamed for him.
